text.0: of this benignant priest with eld greycoloured the brother midmost of the three is lightning.
text.1: the third is he whose back with oil is sprinkled here i behold the chief with seven male children.
text.2: seven to the onewheeled chariot yoke the courser bearing seven names the single courser draws it.

text.11: what was that one who in the unborns image hath stablished and fixed firm these worlds six regions.
text.12: let him who knoweth presently declare it this lovely birds securely founded station.

text.63: he yet enveloped in his mothers bosom source of much life hath sunk into destruction.

text.65: between the widespread worldhalves is the birthplace the father laid the daughters germ within it.
